name: docsafterdark
description: Beyond dark mode for Google Docs
author: Raymond Wang

scripts.build: webpack --mode=production && sass src/scss/inject.scss build/inject.bundle.css && sass src/scss/frame.scss build/frame.bundle.css && sass src/scss/global.scss build/global.bundle.css && web-ext lint --config=web-ext.config.mjs && ts-node package.ts
scripts.dev: concurrently --names 'webpack,sass,sass,sass' --prefix-colors 'magenta,red,blue,yellow' 'webpack --watch' 'sass --watch src/scss/inject.scss build/inject.bundle.css' 'sass --watch src/scss/frame.scss build/frame.bundle.css' 'sass --watch src/scss/global.scss build/global.bundle.css'
